channel.title: How to change the exp rate?
channel.description: Hey everyone, finally got my client working, and noticed the exp rate was really high. I'm using the Project Purple client with the TestScape source. I've been through all the tutorials, but I can't seem to find any of the items that they tell me to look for. Where do I need to go in this particular client to change the exp rate? Thanks in advance.

item.title: How to change the exp rate?
item.dc:creator: @thedrumguy thedrumguy
item.description:
@thedrumguy wrote:

Hey everyone, finally got my client working, and noticed the exp rate was really high.
I’m using the Project Purple client with the TestScape source. I’ve been through all the tutorials, but I can’t seem to find any of the items that they tell me to look for. Where do I need to go in this particular client to change the exp rate?
Thanks in advance.

Read full topic
